name: a96c0941-3257-5ecc-a94a-6939a51480e6
notes: The Czech Legal Text Treebank 2.0 (CLTT 2.0) annotates the same texts as the CLTT 1.0. These texts come from the legal domain and they are manually syntactically annotated. The CLTT 2.0 annotation on the syntactic layer is more elaborate than in the CLTT 1.0 from various aspects. In addition, new annotation layers were added to the data: (i) the layer of accounting entities, and (ii) the layer of semantic entity relations.
title: Czech Legal Text Treebank 2.0
